thread.title: BRIEF-The UPS Store, Marken Team Up For Drop-Off Service For Clinical Trial Samples In U.S.

title: BRIEF-The UPS Store, Marken Team Up For Drop-Off Service For Clinical Trial Samples In U.S.

organizations.name: clinical trial samples in u.s. reuters

text: February 28, 2018 / 4:47 PM / in 15 minutes BRIEF-The UPS Store, Marken Team Up For Drop-Off Service For Clinical Trial Samples In U.S. Reuters Staff Feb 28 (Reuters) - The UPS Store: * THE UPS STORE, MARKEN TEAM UP FOR DROP-OFF SERVICE FOR CLINICAL TRIAL SAMPLES IN U.S. * THE UPS STORE - ‍LAUNCH OF NEW OPTION WILL ALLOW NURSES TO DROP OFF CLINICAL TRIAL SAMPLES AT ABOUT 4,600 UPS STORE LOCATIONS WITHIN U.S. * THE ‍UPS STORE​ SAYS ‍MARKEN WILL MANAGE BOOKING OF SHIPMENTS WITH UPS​‍​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
